mapper.insert: insert into meetings.meeting(meetingDescription, meetingName, sponsorId, beginTime, endTime, meetingHosts, meetingLocation, meetingHotel, isPass, name, number, gender, org, fullId, pTime, needRoom) value (#{meetingDescription},#{meetingName},#{sponsorId},#{beginTime},#{endTime},#{meetingHosts},#{meetingLocation},#{meetingHotel}, false,#{name},#{number},#{gender},#{org},#{fullId},#{ptime},#{needRoom})
mapper.select: select * from meetings.meeting where sponsorId != #{sponsorId} and isPass = true;
